item.description:
Because of the snow storm that is predicted for this weekend,
This event has been changed to Saturday, Dec. 29.
Please change your RSVP if necessary.

CT Paranormal has invited Greater New Haven Unknown Zone to their
CT PRI Christmas Eggnog Party.

As I have said before, we have a few CT Paranormal members in our
Group. If you RSVP Yes in CT Paranormal site, then you are
Encouraged to RSVP Yes in Unknown Zone.
We are aware of the count so you can say Yes in
Both sites.

CT Paranormal is a Private Location.
Their address will not be shown on line.
Their location will be sent to individual members
Via e-mail if they RSVP Yes.

This quote is from CT Paranormal;

Hello investigators, it's our annual Christmas Party!!!
It gives us all a chance to wish each other a wonderful
Holiday and and a beautiful New Year.

Come and enjoy the fun and the spirit of the Holidays!!

Please bring a dish.
I will make the Ham!!!
or I could make a Turkey!!
with stuffing take a vote let me know :)

Please post what side dish or desert you will be bringing.
See you there I will bring the Eggnog :)

End of quote.

It should be lots of fun.

If there is bad weather, then I am assuming that this
Event will be cancelled and rescheduled.

Maybes will be allowed in this Unknown Zone Site.
I will just leave the Maybes there instead of
Changing them to No this time.
I still consider Maybes the day of the event
To be the same as a No.

Ho Ho Ho

Happy all holidays or whatever else they are called this time of year.

Happy Yule & Winter Solstice for any Wiccans.

Remember, there is also snow predicted for Thursday into
Friday, so be careful this Thursday and Saturday.

Mike B
Organizer

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Deck The Halls Christmas Eggnog Party-Date Change
